This decision will allow you to gain french as an accepted culture. Meanwhile you release Canada and lose Anglo Canadian as an accpeted Culture.

This decision will allow you to gain cores on France. These lands are comparable with a peace treaty of the anglo-french wars. Meanwhile you release Australia and lose australian as an accpeted Culture..

This decision will allow you to gain a immigration attraction.
This decision will allow you to gain a pop growth.

This decision allows you to claim Cuba, Haiti and inherit the Caribbean Islands as well as french New Foundland. Furthermore you gain the caribbeans cultures as accepted.
This decision will allow you to claim cores on south england. Furthermore you gain a modfier as well as 10 Infamy.
This decision will allow you to claim cores on north england. Furthermore you gain British as an accepted culture as well as 25 Prestige.

This decision will allow you to claim cores on ireland as well. Furthermore you gain Irish as an accepted culture as well as 18 Infamy..
